short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your bookmarks in one place, organised, always only a click away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop wasting your time organising and looking for your bookmarks. Within one click you can see all of your latest bookmarks, see when they were added and what other bookmarks you have made for that website. Everything in place, organised, always only a click away.
